title.value: A widget to transfer values through source and target Wires

description.value: This widget represents a controller task to transfer a value from a source to a target, through a source and a target Wires, when an event (a function) or a topic is issued. If this widget has child ChildWire widgets, their _addWire() methods are called to add Wire arguments to a source or a target Wire.
